alert.note: Alert for Luquillo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 08 at 10:54AM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AST TODAY... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Excessive runoff and mudslides affecting local roads. * WHERE...Luquillo. * WHEN...Until noon AST. * IMPACTS...Local roads impassable due to mudslides. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1051 AM AST, Heavy rain has ended, but emergency management reported road PR-984 near km 2.4 in Bo Juan Martin impassable due to a mudslide. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
